story_02_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
This way, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Barry should be just up ahead!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hurry up! I want to introduce you all!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
OK, OK! Hold your Horsea...
What kind of person is this Barry, anyway?
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... I think I’d describe Barry as a pretty
straightforward, purehearted, “nice guy”
sort of Trainer!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
He’s always so earnest and sincere—
I feel like I could learn a lot from him!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Oh, and on top of all that, he’s also a
really great Pokémon Trainer!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Even Cynthia speaks highly of him!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Wow, really?
I’m looking forward to meeting this Barry now!
story_02_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well, come on, then! Let’s hurry!
